thread.title: WATCH: Tulsa completes Hail Mary for TD against Memphis
thread.title_full: WATCH: Tulsa completes Hail Mary for TD against Memphis

title: WATCH: Tulsa completes Hail Mary for TD against Memphis
text:
WATCH: Tulsa completes Hail Mary for TD against Memphis Rob Ferguson / USA TODAY Sports Oct 23, 2015 at 11:00p ET 0Shares 
Memphis had little trouble with Tulsa in the first half Thursday night, taking a seemingly commanding 35-14 lead into the final minutes of the second quarter. But the Golden Hurricane turned the tide with one wild play -- and a little help from the Tigers ' secondary. 
On the final play of the first half, Tulsa quarterback Dane Evans escaped the pocket near midfield, slipped out of a tackle and unleashed a Hail Mary ... that deflected off the fingertips of two Tigers defensive backs and was caught by lunging Golden Hurricane receiver Keyarris Garrett , who fell over the goal line for a 46-yard touchdown. 
Watch it below: 
The touchdown catch was the second of three on the night for Garrett, who had posted a career-best 183 yards by the middle of the third quarter. 
Memphis led 52-35 after three quarters. 0
